Sentencas: The crystal structure and thermal expansion of the perovskite oxides in the system Pr1-xSrxCo1-y MnyO3-delta (x = 0.3, 0.5, 0 less than or equal to y less than or equal to 1) were studied in air, by X-ray powder diffraction and dilatometry, respectively.
Titulo: The perovskite oxide system Pr1-xSrxCo1-yMnyO3-δ:: Crystal structure and thermal expansion

Sentencas: All compositions have an orthorhombic GdFeO3-type structure (Pbnm space group).
Titulo: The perovskite oxide system Pr1-xSrxCo1-yMnyO3-δ:: Crystal structure and thermal expansion

Sentencas: The lattice parameters were determined at room temperature.
Titulo: The perovskite oxide system Pr1-xSrxCo1-yMnyO3-δ:: Crystal structure and thermal expansion

Sentencas: The pseudo-cubic lattice constant decreases on increasing Co content.
Titulo: The perovskite oxide system Pr1-xSrxCo1-yMnyO3-δ:: Crystal structure and thermal expansion

Sentencas: The thermal expansion coefficient increases as the Co content of the oxides increases for both series with 30 and 50 mol% Sr.
Titulo: The perovskite oxide system Pr1-xSrxCo1-yMnyO3-δ:: Crystal structure and thermal expansion

Sentencas: Among the Go-containing compositions, those with 20 mol% Co exhibit thermal expansion compatibility with Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 electrolyte in the whole examined temperature range (room temperature to 800 degrees C).
Titulo: The perovskite oxide system Pr1-xSrxCo1-yMnyO3-δ:: Crystal structure and thermal expansion

Sentencas: They can be considered, therefore, as candidate cathode materials for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: The perovskite oxide system Pr1-xSrxCo1-yMnyO3-δ:: Crystal structure and thermal expansion
